architect.name: Architect
architect.description: A master builder who can found new cities on empty plots.

abilities.name: Found City
abilities.description: Travels to an empty plot to start the construction of a new city. The founding time is reduced by the number of villagers sent with him.

liberator.name: Liberator
liberator.description: A cunning agent specializing in rescue missions. Can be sent to an enemy city with silver from your cave to attempt to free a captured hero.

abilities.name: Rescue Mission
abilities.description: Attempts to free a captured hero by bribing guards. Success depends on the amount of silver sent versus the silver stored in the target's cave. Failure results in the agent's death.
